review: The content is not as good as Apple TV .Must have Amazon prime to provide context economically.
author: Harry W Coburn

review: Fantastic! Between the Fire Reader and Fire TV Stick....I've got it all. Love It!
author: dude

review: Love the ease in using this little thing: no streaming with another device--in fact it doesn't seem like a "device"-just a TV that interfaces with about everything.
author: Scott

review: I love Fire Sticks ! We have two of them now, one in the living room and one in the bedroom. They are the best thing invented since sliced bread !
author: E. S.

review: Great product  for price. Easy to hook up and lots of shows available to watch.I don't know if it is our internet service or fire stick but now and then buffering  will occur.👍👍👍👍
author: carol  Stewart

review: amazing able, nice interface and programmable, will buy more
author: Derick Rosas "DROSE"

review: It arrived proptly but I had some difficulty in putting it into operation.  however, it works fine now.
author: Ralph Stevens "old timer"
